timeline.message:
Removed deprecated WebServer log formatter.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Removed deprecated gRPC tracing configuration.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Removed deprecated methods in PersistenceUnitInfoBean

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Removed jpa-weld deprecated module

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Removed deprecated method in MetricsSupport

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Removed deprecated methods in metrics RegistryFactory

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Removed deprecated UserStore class

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Removed deprecated methods in EndpointConfig.

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Removed deprecated method in JaegerTracerBuilder

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Removed deprecated method in TracerBuilder

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Removed deprecated constructor in ExperimentalConfiguration

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Updated deprecated docs in WebClient

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Removed deprecated method "span" on Request and related classes.
Changed signature of "spanContext" and refactored usages

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

Fix compilation issue

Signed-off-by: Tomas Langer <tomas.langer@oracle.com>

timeline.bodyText: Maybe since the method will be removed you could use @Deprecated(forRemoval = true)?
timeline.author: ljnelson

replies.bodyText: I will create a follow up for that.
replies.author: tomas-langer
